function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for food products leading to panic buying","Impact":"Shortages, overcrowding, and increased risk of contagion in supermarkets","Mitigation":"Implement restrictions on the number of customers, expand supplier network, and offer free delivery","Technologies":"Mobile apps for online ordering, contactless payment systems","People":"Customers, supermarket staff","Owner":"Supermarket management"},{"Description":"Closure of restaurants and cafes leading to job losses and risk of permanent closure","Impact":"Unemployment and reduced access to food options for consumers","Mitigation":"Financial support for businesses, transitioning to alternative business models, and implementing delivery services","Technologies":"Food delivery apps, online ordering systems, and digital marketing platforms","People":"Restaurant and cafe employees, local communities","Owner":"Government, business owners"},{"Description":"Increased domestic violence due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Risk of physical, emotional, and sexual abuse, and difficulty in seeking help","Mitigation":"Providing helplines, awareness campaigns, and safe reporting systems","Technologies":"Online reporting platforms, mobile apps for helplines, and secure communication tools","People":"Victims of domestic violence, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Charities, government"}]}
